name: puffed
content:

Add to word list
used to describe grains that have been heated to a high temperature so that they become many times larger than their original size. Puffed grains are often used in breakfast cereals: We recommend puffed wheat with no added salt. a box of puffed rice
More examplesFewer examplesPuffed grains are popular in the form of rice cakes.Muri is a type of puffed grain from the Indian subcontinent, made from rice.How are puffed corn snacks made?
